remarks: Value of the subgroup coset equivalence relation on an abelian group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
eqgabl.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
eqgabl.n $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
eqgabl.r $e |- .~ = ( G ~QG S ) $.
eqgabl $p |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ S C_ X ) -> ( A .~ B <-> ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ ( B .- A ) e. S ) ) ) $.
